headline: Lowe's Launches $2.5 Million Western North Carolina Small Business Recovery Fund
summary: As Lowe's continues to address the urgent and evolving community needs in the wake of Hurricane Helene, the company today launched the Lowe's Western North Carolina Small Business Recovery Fund. The $2.5 million fund will provide grants directly to small businesses in the company's home state and support local business development organizations advance their work to help businesses navigate disaster relief aid.

headline: Three Reasons To Avoid Lowe's And One Stock To Buy Instead
summary: Lowe's trades at $270.40 per share and has stayed right on track with the overall market, gaining 16.1% over the last six months while the S&P 500 returned 14.5%.
